channel.title: Blog.jetbrains.com on .NET Ramblings
channel.description: Recent content in Blog.jetbrains.com on .NET Ramblings

item.title: Apply for an IDE Research Integration Grant
item.description: JetBrains is devoted to bringing the latest ideas and technologies to developers worldwide. Many innovations are born in academia, and researchers are often looking for practical applications for their projects. We are introducing the IDE Research Integration Grant Program, aimed at computer science researchers who have already completed research projects they would like to deploy […] Link to article: https://blog.jetbrains.com/blog/2024/05/09/apply-for-an-ide-research-integration-grant/

item.title: Meet the JetBrains Team at Microsoft Build 2024
item.description: On May 21–23, 2024, the Microsoft Build conference is bringing together a diverse community of coders and engineers, and JetBrains is happy to be a part of it. You can attend the event either online or in person in Seattle, WA, USA. To engage with us online, check out our partner page, and don’t forget […] Link to article: https://blog.jetbrains.com/dotnet/2024/05/08/meet-jetbrains-at-microsoft-build-2024/

item.title: Risk Modeling in Python With Datalore and AI Assistant
item.description: Risk is an inherent part of the financial landscape, and as investors, we’re constantly seeking ways to quantify and mitigate it. By modeling risks, we can assess potential losses and make informed decisions. By quantifying risk, we can develop strategies to minimize risk exposure and optimize returns. Python, with its rich ecosystem of libraries and […] Link to article: https://blog.jetbrains.com/datalore/2024/05/08/risk-modeling-in-python-with-datalore-and-ai-assistant/

item.title: What’s Next: The WebStorm 2024.2 Roadmap
item.description: In April this year, we released WebStorm 2024.1, our first major update for 2024. Thank you to everyone who is already using it and providing us with feedback. With April now behind us, we’d like to announce what we’ve got planned for the next release of WebStorm, which is scheduled for the end of July, […] Link to article: https://blog.jetbrains.com/webstorm/2024/05/2024-2-roadmap/

item.title: Developer Ecosystem Survey Insights: A Comparative Look at Students and Professionals
item.description: Our series exploring how market and user research is done at JetBrains continues. Want to learn more about research insights and take part in future JetBrains studies? Join our JetBrains Tech Insights Lab! The world of IT is a rapidly growing industry, attracting more and more people with a passion for creative and challenging tasks. […] Link to article: https://blog.jetbrains.com/research/2024/05/developer-ecosystem-survey-insights-a-comparative-look-at-students-and-professionals/
